00038 uvm_resource_base::uvm_resource_base(const std::string& name, const std::string& scope) :
00039     sc_object(),
00040     m_read_only(false),
00041     m_precedence(m_default_precedence),
00042     m_name(name)
00043 {
00044     set_scope(scope);
00045 }

00052 }

00058 {
00059     m_read_only = true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 //
00065 void uvm_resource_base::set_read_write()
00066 {
00067     m_read_only = false;
00068 }

00087     ::sc_core::wait(m_modified_event);

00095 void uvm_resource_base::set_scope(std::string scope)
00096 {
00097     m_scope = uvm_glob_to_regex(scope);
00098 }
00099 
00100 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 
00105 std::string uvm_resource_base::get_scope()
00106 {
00107     return m_scope;
00108 }

00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 
00119 bool uvm_resource_base::match_scope(std::string scope)
00120 {
00121     // FIXME - temporary
00122     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00123     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(m_scope);
00124 
00125     return uvmsc_boost::regex_match((const std::string) scope, what, re);
00126 }

00156 void uvm_resource_base::set_priority(uvm_resource_priority_e priority)
00157 {
00158     uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00159     rpool->set_priority_name(this, priority);
